quote_first: The last communication with the Teasdale had been at
quote_last: , nearly a day and a half earlier, when the captain reported to the Coast Guard station at Duluth that he was altering the shipâ€™s course to seek shelter in the lee of the Apostle Islands. Because no other communication occurred, it was assumed that the ore carrier had made it safely and was waiting out the storm.
title: Purgatory Ridge
author: William Kent Krueger
